channel.title: Client run.bat error
channel.description:
So with this code: [code]TITLE Allstar client @echo off cls java -Xmx800M EGUI pause[/code] I get: [code]Error: could not find find or load main class EGUI[/code] The file EGUI.class is in the same folder as the run.bat
Help would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: Client run.bat error
item.dc:creator: @xzorniax xzorniax
item.description:
@xzorniax wrote:

So with this code:

TITLE Allstar client @echo off cls java -Xmx800M EGUI pause
I get:

The file EGUI.class is in the same folder as the run.bat

Help would be greatly appreciated!
